title: Question to Riot (almost crucial for me)

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: Dear Riot. This thing stucked in my head for couple of weeks. I'm curious how much "ORIGINAL" Urgot's body has left? Let's say that its Urgot previous body before "small changes". If you could answer me or draw line were his body end I would be very pleased :D

replies.body:
Hey Sirius, I spoke to Larry "The Bravo" Ray, the mad genius who designed all of Urgot's chem-tech parts. {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}} 

He said that he imagines Urgot has been evenly bisected, i.e. everything is cut off partway through his torso. However (**and this is a bit graphic**), his spine continues past where the rest of his torso has been cut off, to connect into the machinery beneath him. This is part of what allows his nervous system to control it. 

Part of his belly might also be missing behind the steel plate, his digestive system replaced with machinery. And his arm's loss is his weapon's gain.

That's as official of an answer as we can give, until something actually becomes official!

I would say it's probably not a straight line considering his arm and need for a respirator. Probably more like this:

https://imgur.com/a/E16iZ

But I assume he got rid of his _"main weapon"_ 
{{sticker:sg-lulu}} 
as it could be considered a hindrance and probably just uses hormones to compensate.
his main weapon is incorporated onto his ult {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
